title: What is the most popular band in the world right now? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Beatles Now, you may be asking why The Beatles. They broke up in 1970. Well, judging from total sales and just the name, they are easily the most recognizable band of all time. Even to this day, they outsell many artists. And the fact that Paul McCartney is very relevant today, it helps. From 2000 - 2010, they're 1 Album was the best selling album of the decade. It outsold Justin Bieber, One Direction, Drake, Rihanna, etc. From 1991 - 2016, they sold more than 65 million albums. This does NOT include digital sales. Yet, their digital sales are in the millions. In 2014, a plaque was placed in JFK Airport to commemorate their 50th anniversary of coming to America.  The Beatles have broken up almost 50 years ago. Yet, they are still always talked about. Their music still selling millions every year. The 4 names of John, Paul, George, and Ringo being so recognizable. Some people may think the Beatles are overrated "and all that rubbish." -George Harrison But it still doesn't change the fact that they are still so popular today. And let's not forget, their most recognizable songs… Let It Be Hey Jude Yesterday Yellow Submarine Here Comes the Sun I strongly believe The Beatles are still the most popular band/artists today. And it'll be like that for generations.
